Uses of Class
nitf.DownSampler

Uses of DownSampler in nitf
 

Subclasses of DownSampler in nitf
 class MaxDownSampler
          MaxDownSampler The maxDownSample selects the maximum pixel

The row and column skip factors divide the sub-window into non-overlaping sample windows.
 class PixelSkipDownSampler
          PixelSkipDownSampler The pixelSkip down-sampler has a designated skip value in the row and column, and it skips data in between.
 class SumSq2BandDownSampler
          SumSq2BandDownSampler Sum of square, two band, down-sample method The maximum is calculated as the sum of the sum of squares of two bands.
 

Methods in nitf that return DownSampler
protected static DownSampler DownSampler.getByAddress(long address)
          This returns the DownSampler object represented by the given underlying memory address.
 DownSampler SubWindow.getDownSampler()
          Returns the DownSampler for this window, or null if none is specified
 

Methods in nitf with parameters of type DownSampler
protected static void DownSampler.register(DownSampler downSampler)
          This sets the class type for the given DownSampler instance
 void SubWindow.setDownSampler(DownSampler downSampler)
          Sets the DownSampler for this SubWindow If none is specified, or if downSampler is null, the data will not be downsampled
